original_text: The whole group of believers was happy with the apostles' words. So first they chose a man called Stephen. Stephen believed strongly in God and he was full of the Holy Spirit. The believers also chose six other men: Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas and Nicolas. Nicolas was from Antioch. He was not born as a Jew, but he had joined the Jews later.
korean_text: 온 무리가 이 말을 기뻐하여 믿음과 성령이 충만한 사람 스데반과 또 빌립과 브로고로와 니가노르와 디몬과 바메나와 유대교에 입교했던 안디옥 사람 니골라를 택하여

sentences.original_text: The whole group of believers was happy
So first they chose a man called Stephen
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 먼저 스데반이라는 사람을 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he was full of the Holy Spirit
The believers also chose six other men
sentences.korean_translation: 믿는 사람들은 또한 다른 여섯 사람을 선택했습니다

sentences.original_text: Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas and Nicolas
sentences.korean_translation: 빌립, 브로고로, 니가노르, 디몬, 바르메나와 니골라

sentences.original_text: He was not born as a Jew
but he had joined the Jews later
